places.name: Tampa
places.description: A vibrant city on Florida's Gulf Coast known for its beaches, diverse culture, and thriving nightlife scene.

places.name: New Hampshire
places.description: The Live Free or Die state, famous for stunning fall foliage, mountains, and no state income tax.

places.name: Huntsville
places.description: The Rocket City - home to NASA's Marshall Space Flight Center and a thriving aerospace industry.

places.name: Auburn
places.description: Home to Auburn University and the famous 'War Eagle' battle cry. A classic college town experience.

places.name: Redmond
places.description: Pacific Northwest tech hub, home to major technology companies and beautiful natural surroundings.

places.name: Hattiesburg
places.description: The Hub City of Mississippi, known for Southern hospitality and the University of Southern Mississippi.

places.name: Florence
places.description: Historic city in the Tennessee Valley, known for its music heritage and charming downtown area.

metadata.description: Places I've lived throughout my life
